thread.section_title: Holiday Inn Express London - Hammersmith - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Clever location for all purposes
thread.title_full: Clever location for all purposes - Review of Holiday Inn Express London - Hammersmith, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Lior B
title: Clever location for all purposes
text:
Excellent hotel , clean , spotless room , comfy beds etc all good.
As an IHG member you feel home.
let me give you a tip - it is the location!! , if it is your first time in London and want to explore oxford st. area , that is fine.
but if you are already experienced with oxford, regent etc , you can have all the big retails names in mini in evolving Hammersmith. plenty of bars and eateries all around , tube station is 5 min walk and if you have not enough westfield mall is nearby. at the ground floor of the hotel you have a lovely brunch of wetherspoon which mean you can have great food and large selections of drinks for a laughing price. the area is predominantly for locals and this is the beauty of staying in this hotel. if you have a car they also have a car park ( for fee) . a super value for money hotel.
